issue_title: [Bug] from_dict creates non-empty strings for missing timestamps, breaking __post_init

tdd_plan.summary: Fix str(None) returning 'None' string which is truthy, preventing __post_init__ from initializing timestamps
tdd_plan.root_cause: src/flywheel/todo.py:100-101 - str(data.get('created_at') or '') converts None to 'None' string instead of empty string

files_to_modify.changes: Add regression tests for from_dict timestamp handling
Remove str() wrapper from created_at and updated_at in from_dict method

implementation_sequence: 2. Remove str() wrapper from lines 100-101 in src/flywheel/todo.py
